question: In March 2019, which state defeated Maharashtra in the final match of 2018–19 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy?
explanation: Karnataka defeated Maharashtra in the final match of 2018–19 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy. 2018–19 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy was the tenth edition of Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, a Twenty20 competition in India. It took place between 21 February and 14 March 2019. Karnataka won the tournament, after beating Maharashtra by eight wickets in the final.
